this_title: The Natural World: Giant Otters of the Amazon
trans_title: 自然世界：亚马孙的巨獭
イクメン・オオカワウソ奮闘中
introduction: Diablo the giant otter lives in a lake in the jungles of Peru, with his unruly family of six cubs. Even at the tender age of six months, they need to learn how to survive in this dangerous paradise. Their dad teaches them to swim and eventually to catch piranha for themselves, but they must also learn to stay away from the neighbours from hell - the giant caiman. These large me...

foreign_title: The Natural World: Giant Otters of the Amazon
